paper_abstract: In this paper, we introduce the edge versions of reverse Wiener numbers RWe and CWe due to distances matrices RDe and CDe. Next, we conclude several results about the relations among them and edge Wiener numbers. Also, we compute the edge reverse Wiener numbers of some familiar graphs such as trees, cycles, complete graphs and nanotubes.
paper_title: On the Edge Reverse Wiener Numbers of a Graph
